lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee (IOC) is launching disciplinary cases against all 28 Russian athletes implicated in  the manipulation of urine samples collected at the 2014 Olympic Winter Games in Sochi, it said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: IOC Starts Disciplinary Procedures Against 28 Russian Athletes
headline.main: IOC Starts Disciplinary Procedures Against 28 Russian Athletes
